issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: A patch for this issue has been uploaded to JIRA by a contributor.
status.name: Patch Available

fields.description: Containers debug information launch_container.sh and directory.info are always logged into first directory of NM_LOG_DIRS instead of using the log directory returned from getLogPathForWrite.
fields.summary: Using getLocalPathForWrite for Container related debug information
